post.body: Being completely ignorant about these things, I ask: What is the purpose of your actor's logbook? BTW Hi - nice to meet you :-)
Hi Dave - found you through Mike Dillard - glad to meet you!
And what are you doing TASTING your car keys?
has anyone told you yet that #GNO is Girls' Night Out? The hashtag makes it easier to search. Another ex: #firstfollow
Your new background looks great, John! Very clever.
Getting your cannoli from a Sicilian bakery? You are in for a treat! (Maybe you could ship one out here?)
Christmas cards are a bit different. I think many think of them as rote rather than as specially thought out, so d/n matter
Despite what peeps say about envrmnt, most REALLY like receiving snail-mail card over e-cards. I do - it's more personal
here's another one to check out: 1america
Okay - sorry I haven't been following along but I don't know what #issm is. No one else will answer & you are my last hope ?? :-)
Physiotherapist told me today: 1 cup of caffeinated drink/day will help pain. Evidence suggest that more than that hinders.
#ISSM? Intl Society for Sex Medicine? Subservice Microbiology? Semiconductor Manufacturing? etc Please enlighten
I'm glad you liked the card, Bette. Congratulations again!
I'd teach my child humility. Once you have that, you can learn just about anything.
A sonnet - I'm impressed! http://tinyurl.com/5cgyrq
Hi water levels in Northumberland Strait combined w heavy pounding surf (b/c of blizzard force winds) may cause flood during high tide 2nite
The north shore of Nova Scotia is really getting blasted by a blizzard. All New Years' Levees cancelled (!!) We are 'storm-stayed' for sure.
Nova Scotia has an actual blizzard warning for tomorrow. Figures: 1 of husband's only holidays - guess he'll be playing with the snow blower
The first person I followed on Twitter was @jennifertribe http://www.highspotinc.com/ #firstfollow
I just joined the tweetoneword Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/tweetoneword and you can too. Please Retweet.
